user.title: OpenEI (Step 1)
user.description:
If you do not have an API Key yet you can get one here: https://openei.org/services/api/signup/

Omit address to use latitude and longitude from Home Assistant.

user_3.title: OpenEI (Step 3)
user_3.description:
Select your plan from the list. If you are unsure, check your utility bill.

Manual plan will override the selected rate plan.
